bibdata.title: IEEE Draft Standard for Information Technology--Telecommunications and Information Exchange Between Systems Local and Metropolitan Area Networks--Specific Requirements Part 11: Wireless LAN Medium Access Control (MAC) and Physical Layer (PHY) Specifications Amendment: Wake-up radio operation

IEEE Draft Standard for Information Technology--Telecommunications and Information Exchange Between Systems Local and Metropolitan Area Networks--Specific Requirements Part 11: Wireless LAN Medium Access Control (MAC) and Physical Layer (PHY) Specifications Amendment: Wake-up radio operation
bibdata.docidentifier: IEEE P802.11ba/D2.0, January 2019 (amendment to IEEE P802.11REVmd/D2.0, as amended by IEEE P802.11ax/D3.3, IEEE P802.11ay/D2.2, and IEEE P802.11az/D0.6)

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: This amendment defines modifications to both the IEEE 802.11 physical layer (PHY) and the medium access control (MAC) sublayer for wake-up radio operation.

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers
